<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/165315584d6587e287f54d6c8820e050114b5694|patch 8.2.0232: the :compiler command causes a crash>
patch 8.2.0232: the :compiler command causes a crash

Problem:    The :compiler command causes a crash. (Daniel Steinberg)
Solution:   Do not use the script index if it isn't set.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0232: the :compiler command causes a crash · vim/vim@1653155
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0232: the :compiler command causes a crash · vim/vim@1653155
attachments.text: Problem: The :compiler command causes a crash. (Daniel Steinberg) Solution: Do not use the script index if it isn't set.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4f645c54efe33d7a11e314676e503118761f08a7|patch 8.2.0233: crash when using garbagecollect() in between rand()>
patch 8.2.0233: crash when using garbagecollect() in between rand()

Problem:    Crash when using garbagecollect() in between rand().
Solution:   Redesign the rand() and srand() implementation. (Yasuhiro
            Matsumoto, closes #5587, closes #5588)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0233: crash when using garbagecollect() in between rand() · vim/vim@4f645c5
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0233: crash when using garbagecollect() in between rand() · vim/vim@4f645c5
attachments.text: Problem: Crash when using garbagecollect() in between rand(). Solution: Redesign the rand() and srand() implementation. (Yasuhiro Matsumoto, closes #5587, closes #5588)

text:

patch 8.2.0234: message test fails on SunOS

Problem:    Message test fails on SunOS.
Solution:   Adjust expectation for printf "%p". (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #5595)

attachments.text: Problem: Message test fails on SunOS. Solution: Adjust expectation for printf "%p". (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #5595)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/dbe5d361feb65137099644329cf0ecfd4a945a14|patch 8.2.0235: draw error when an empty group is removed from 'statu…>
patch 8.2.0235: draw error when an empty group is removed from 'statusline'

Problem:    Draw error when an empty group is removed from 'statusline'.
Solution:   Do not use highlighting from a removed group.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0235: draw error when an empty group is removed from 'statu… · vim/vim@dbe5d36
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0235: draw error when an empty group is removed from 'statu… · vim/vim@dbe5d36
attachments.text: …sline' Problem: Draw error when an empty group is removed from 'statusline'. Solution: Do not use highlighting from a removed group.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/57ea2924e5dd14aac716a1ee349bdb61f6429f59|patch 8.2.0236: MS-Windows unintall doesn't delete vimtutur.bat>
patch 8.2.0236: MS-Windows unintall doesn't delete vimtutur.bat

Problem:    MS-Windows unintall doesn't delete vimtutur.bat.
Solution:   Change directory before deletion. (Ken Takata, closes #5603)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0236: MS-Windows unintall doesn't delete vimtutur.bat · vim/vim@57ea292
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0236: MS-Windows unintall doesn't delete vimtutur.bat · vim/vim@57ea292
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows unintall doesn't delete vimtutur.bat. Solution: Change directory before deletion. (Ken Takata, closes #5603)
